Hot Chocolate

Favorite NES game?

Boulder Dash (dodging falling rocks and turning bugs into diamonds, yeeha)

Favourite musical movie?

Hamilton

Favorite Sci-Fi movie?

Dark Star, written by Alan Dean Foster.

What is your favourite Operetta?

 

(When was Hamilton made into a Movie?)

The Mikado 

What is your favourite Broadway musical song?

[CHRISTINE]
In sleep he sang to me, in dreams he came
That voice which calls to me and speaks my name
And do I dream again? For now I find
The Phantom of the Opera is there
Inside my mind

[PHANTOM]
Sing once again with me, our strange duet
My power over you grows stronger yet
And though you turn from me to glance behind
The Phantom of the Opera is there
Inside your mind
[CHRISTINE]
Those who have seen your face
Draw back in fear
I am the mask you wear

[PHANTOM]
It's me they hear...

[BOTH]
Your/My spirit and my/your voice
In one combined
The Phantom of the Opera is there
Inside my/your mind

[BACKUP]
Beware, the Phantom of the Opera

[PHANTOM]
In all your fantasies, you always knew
That man and mystery

[CHRISTINE]
Were both in you

[BOTH]
And in this labyrinth, where night is blind
The Phantom of the Opera is here/there

You might also like

[CHRISTINE]
Inside my/your mind...

[PHANTOM]
Sing, my Angel of Music!

[CHRISTINE]
He's there, the Phantom of the Opera

[CHRISTINE vocalizing]

[PHANTOM]
Sing!
Sing for me
Sing, my Angel of Music!
Sing for me!

I have brought you
To the seat of sweet music's throne
To this kingdom where all must pay homage to music
Music...

You have come here
For one purpose and one alone
Since the moment I first heard you sing
I have needed you with me to serve me, to sing
For my music
My music...

 

I love the opening with the chandelier, and the swell of the theme.

 

What is your favourite Ballet?

Music of the Night from Phantom of the Opera still leaving this cuz Phantom of the Opera!

Ninjad….

so uh… Nutcracker or Swan Lake

@AlamoVampire I knew I liked you for a reason.

Unfortunately you were a smidge too late.

Now corrected so.

My favourite time, though it has been a long while, is that moment when you are sitting on a beach looking at the water on the horizon and the very edge of the sun suddenly peaks up out of the ocean.

 

What is your favourite state of mind?

 

Edited October 16, 2022 by ColdJ

Peaceful hopeful excitement

favorite Broadway musical?

@ColdJ Ive seen the North American Tour of Phantom of the Opera twice, the first time I actually sat with a cast member that was taking over a role after the production left town. The second time I got to see said cast member perform! Ive seen (and have on bluray) both the 25th anniversary performance from The Royal Albert Hall as well as the Gerard Butler movie version. Its by far my favorite Broadway Musical with Cats being a close second.

favorite poem

045210172022

Lays of Ancient Rome by Thomas Babington Macaulay 

Then out spake brave Horatius,
The Captain of the Gate:
"To every man upon this earth
Death cometh soon or late.
And how can man die better
Than facing fearful odds,
For the ashes of his fathers,
And the temples of his Gods."
